sourceMeaningMnemonic: You cut the <radical>flowers</radical> off the <radical>grain</radical> with your <radical>knife</radical>. The flowers that fall off are <kanji>jasmine</kanji> flowers.
meaningInfo: It's weird that jasmine flowers are growing out of your grain, but that's why you're cutting them off.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>jasmine</kanji> is growing out of everything, not just grain! It's also growing out of the <reading>ree</reading>ds (<ja>り</ja>)!
readingInfo: You have a farm that grows grain and reeds. Jasmine flowers are growing out of both of those things, ruining your crops! Perhaps you should become a jasmine tea farmer instead...
